<h1 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: Arial;">Flex Environments for Visualizer and Flashboard</span></h1>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l12 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Install </span><a href="http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Eclipse IDE 3.3</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"> or higher</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l12 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Install </span><a href="http://www.adobe.com/cfusion/entitlement/index.cfm?e=flex3email"><span style="color: #800080; font-family: Times New Roman;">Adobe Flex Builder 3 Professional Eclipse Plug-in</span></a></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l12 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Open Eclipse IDE and configure workspace for your projects</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h3 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><span style="font-size: medium; font-family: Arial;">Part I</span></h3>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 1:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">I high recommend add SDK source files into the project. You can specify full path to your SDK inside project Properties -&gt; Flex Build Path or create an Eclipse global variable.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">I can explain some disadvantages using full path inside a project (dot property files):</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l6 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">1)<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span>If you upgrade Flex SDK you need to change path in all Flex projects</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l6 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">2)<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span>You cannot submit your &ldquo;dot&rdquo; properties files into source control or share with other developers without making changes.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l6 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">3)<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span>Every time when you creating a new project you must to browse to SDK location.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Please use another solution.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">From your Eclipse IDE go to Window-&gt;Preferences menu. </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Expand General-&gt;Workspace-&gt;Linked Resources tree nodes. Click on button New&hellip; </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">And create a system variable FLEX_HOME.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">In the location text field browse to your latest flex SDK 3 folder. If you are not working with </span><a href="http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Download+Flex+3"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">nightly Adobe Flex SDK</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"> use SDK from installed Flex Builder 3 Plug-in directory.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click Button OK</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Flashboard</span></strong> developers also need to configure path into sdks\3.1.0\fbpro\projects\datavisualization directory for getting source code of Adobe Charts component. Please add FLEX_FBPRO variable into resources.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">If for some reasons you don&rsquo;t have fbpro project in your Flex SDK directory (what is normal, because this folder exists only when you registered a Flex Builder Pro Adobe Plug-in ONLY FIRST TIME) we have to create and extract files into your SDK folder.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Install </span><a href="http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Sun JDK</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">.<br />2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Get Flex Builder Pro license from your manager or you can purchase from </span><a href="http://www.adobe.com/products/flex/buy/"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Adobe website</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">.&nbsp;<br /><br />a) In you Flex SDK folder you should create &ldquo;fbpro&rdquo; directory.<br />For example: C:\eclipse\Flex Builder 3 Plug-in\sdks\3.1.0\fbpro<br /><br />&nbsp;b) Now we need to create a file &ldquo;license.properties&rdquo; inside &ldquo;sdks\3.1.0\fbpro&rdquo;<br /><br />c) Please add just one line: flexbuilder3=1377-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX<br /><br />Where 1377-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX - Flex Builder Pro serial number<br /><br />d) Open Dos command prompt and type: &ldquo;cd&rdquo; and path to your &ldquo;sdks\3.1.0\lib&rdquo; directory.<br />For me is: cd &ldquo;C:\eclipse\Flex Builder 3 Plug-in\sdks\3.1.0\lib&rdquo;<br /><br />e) Now time to extract DMV-source.jar file:<br />java -jar DMV-source.jar ..\fbpro</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 2:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Open the Eclipse IDE attach a Flex development perspective</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l14 level1 lfo3; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Window-&gt;Open Perspective-&gt;Other&hellip;</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l14 level1 lfo3; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Pick Flex Development item from the list</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l14 level1 lfo3; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click button OK</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Creating Project:</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">File-&gt;New&hellip;-&gt;Flex Project</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Give project name</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Make sure Application type is Web application (runs in Flash Player)</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click Next &gt; Button</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Output folder you can specified into your midtier/built/flex-bin or leave as default (bin-debug) at that point all your JavaScript, HTML and SWF files will be compiled into your local project directory.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click Add Folder&hellip; button</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Add source path to your SDK source files. Click Add Folder&hellip; You can navigate to your Flex HOME_SDK and continue browsing into /frameworks/projects/framework/src directory or copy and paste this path:<br />${FLEX_HOME}/frameworks/projects/framework/src</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click OK to close a popup window</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now you can do the same steps to add datavisualization sources if you need it.<br />${FLEX_FBPRO}\projects\datavisualization\src, where ${FLEX_FBPRO} path to your sdks\3.1.0\fbpro directory.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now time to link source files into our project. Click Add Folder&hellip; one more time and browse into midtier/plugins/flashboards/flex directory.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></em></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span> </em>Who working on Visualizer needs to add midtier/plugins/Visualizer/flex path.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click OK button to save.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click &ldquo;Library Path&rdquo; tab and remove &ldquo;libs&rdquo; folder.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l9 level1 lfo4; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Unfortunately at this time your project doesn&rsquo;t know about your changes and you cannot specify path into Application MXML files for now. Will make these changes in the next Step 3, so please click Finish button.</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 3:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">As I mention before we need to change source directory to start compilation process.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Currently you should get structure similar to this.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Right click on your project and choose Properties menu. </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">In Properties window click Browse&hellip; button for &ldquo;Main source folder&rdquo; text field. You should see know [source path] flex folder. Please select this item and click OK button.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Note: If you added Flashboard and Visualizer flex sources into your project, Flex Builder will generate two folder aliases:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>[source path] flashboards-flex</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">[source path] Visualizer-flex</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Click OK button in the Properties window. </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now you can delete src and libs directories from your Flex Navigator tree.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">To be able to compile project we need to specify Application main file. Expend [source path] flex node, select Flashboard.mxml file, do right click and choose &ldquo;Set as Default Application&rdquo; menu.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .75in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now you can right click on Flashbboard.mxml file again and pick Run As-&gt;Flex Application. Files will be compiled into your output directory (Step 2), but data will not be showing.</span></p>
<h3 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><span style="font-size: medium; font-family: Arial;">Part II</span></h3>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 1:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>In Part I we created project using Flex Builder Plug-in. By default Flex Builder will create .actionScriptProperties, .flexProperties, .project files and two folders:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">libs &ndash; what actually we are not using and can be remove it from the project</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">html-template &ndash; that folder must contain at least on file - index.template.html</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Let&rsquo;s review files and directories under html-template directory.</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo6; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">The history directory contains javascript and html resource for supporting Back and Forward buttons for navigation between views, page states or component changes on your browser. Flex cannot handle Application history changes by default you need to write code for supporting that feature. Currently we are not doing this in Visualizer and Flashboard, but if you are interesting to know more about Flex History you can find on the internet or from </span><a href="http://livedocs.adobe.com/flex/2/docs/wwhelp/wwhimpl/common/html/wwhelp.htm?context=LiveDocs_Parts&amp;file=00000977.html"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Adobe documentation</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo6; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">AC_OETags.js &ndash; That file responsible creating Embed tag or ActiveX object at runtime using JavaScript. You can find similar code </span><a href="http://code.google.com/p/swfobject/"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">here</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">. That was workaround on Microsoft Internet Explorer security updates.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><span style="font-size: 9pt; color: #3f3f3f; font-family: Arial;"><a href="http://news.com.com/Microsoft+tweaks+browser+to+avoid+liability/2100-1012_3-5980658.html?tag=st.ref.goo">Microsoft decided to tweak the browser just enough for them not to be liable </a></span><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in;"><br /><span style="font-size: 9pt; color: #3f3f3f; font-family: Arial;"><a href="http://news.com.com/Microsoft+ordered+to+pay+521+million/2100-1012_3-5062409.html?tag=nl">Instead of facing a $500 million bill in damages</a>,</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo6; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">playerProductInstall.swf - Before Flex SDK was released, ActionScript developers written Flash application using Macromedia Flash Professional. At this time Flash Player was not so popular and instead displaying SWF file content on the browser users getting broken image on white screen. But very soon Macromedia Corporation published JavaScript file to determinate if </span><a href="http://www.adobe.com/devnet/flash/articles/fp8_detection_06.html"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Flash Player installed or not and what version of your player</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>User opened another issue after updating a Flash Player the movie was not loaded. In the Flex SDK Macromedia later Adobe created playerProductInstall.swf what is responsible for redirecting to original SWF content.<br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /><br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /></span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l7 level1 lfo6; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">index.template.html &ndash; We need for two reasons.</span></li>
</ul>
<ol style="margin-top: 0in;" type="1">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo9; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">If you will copy full URL to SWF and paste into Internet Explorer address bar. IE will generate error or show nothing. So, without this file will not be able to test SWF on Internet Explorer.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo9; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">If you want to pass some additional parameters into SWF file or customize your HTML page you can do now using this file. Any changes making in this file will be copied into output directory. <br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /><br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /></span></li>
</ol>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span></em> <span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;</span>The index.template.html will be renamed base on your Application MXML file name. (Flashboard.mxml - &gt;Flashboard.html)</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 2:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>In the in Part I we tried to execute Flashboard.mxml file inside Flex Builder. Application at this time we didn&rsquo;t see any charts. In the midtier we have some additional processing getting data and display on UI.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">During debugging the Flashboard application on your local machine using Flex Builder to get data we need to connect to midtier server or create layout XML file in your html-template directory.</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l5 level1 lfo11; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Delete all files and folders from html-template.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l5 level1 lfo11; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">For the Flashboard copy files from midtier\plugins\flashboards\resources\javascript and midtier\plugins\flashboards\resources\html\index.html files into html-template directory. For the Visuazlier: midtier\plugins\Visualizer\resources\javascript<br />and midtier\plugins\Visualizer\resources\html\index.html</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l5 level1 lfo11; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Additional step who using <strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Flashboard.</span></strong> We need to copy localization JS file(s) from midtier\built\resources\standard\javascript directory and create resources<span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>est directory under and html-template and copy this file midtier\plugins\flashboards\flex\resources<span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>est\layout.xml.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l5 level1 lfo11; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Rename index.html to index.template.html</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l5 level1 lfo11; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Modify index.template.html for testing Application without running midtier server:</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;">Flashboard</span></strong> html-template\index.template.html</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;html lang="en"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;head&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="LocalizedMessages.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="flex.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="BaseController.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="Setup.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;style media="screen" type="text/css"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">body { margin: 0px; overflow:hidden }</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/style&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/head&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;body scroll="no" onload='initSetupScript("Flashboard", "Flashboard", "", new Date().getTime(), "&amp;flashdisplay=1&amp;locale=en_US&amp;defaultlookandfeel=0&amp;debug=1");'&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;div align="center"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;div id="flashcontent"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;script language="JavaScript"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>document.write(new BaseController().getLocalizedMessage("Please wait..."));</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;/div&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/div&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var flashkey="dgofman-sjc-58:Demo:12138933569710";</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp; </span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>//EventDispatcher - we need for BaseController constructor</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var EventDispatcher = new function() {</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>this.setEventHandler=function(obj, fp) {}</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>this.enableSetFieldsEvent=function() {}</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>}</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/body&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/html&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;">Visualizer</span></strong> html-template\index.template.html</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;html lang="en"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;head&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="flex.js"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var src = "${swf}";</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var id<span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>= "${swf}";</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var uri = "";</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var flashvars = "&amp;debug=true";</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>var release = new Date().getTime();</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;style media="screen" type="text/css"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">body { margin: 0px; overflow:hidden }</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/style&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/head&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;body scroll="no" onload='createSWF(src, id, uri, release, flashvars);'&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;div align="center"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;div id="flashcontent"&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>Please wait...</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;/div&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/div&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/body&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/html&gt;</span></p>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 3:</span></em></h2>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l8 level1 lfo12; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now select your project, right click and select Refresh from popup menu.</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l8 level1 lfo12; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">From Eclipse menu select Project-&gt;Clean&hellip;</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l8 level1 lfo12; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now you can execute Flashboard.mxml to be able to get data from local machine. Right click on Flashboard.mxml file and choose Run As - &gt;Flex Application.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Note:</span></span></em></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">If during execution you may get Security Flash Player error, don&rsquo;t worry you need reduce Flash Player security to "read" files from local machine &ndash; (not dangerous &ndash; don&rsquo;t worry).<br />In the browser enter the following URL:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><a href="http://www.macromedia.com/support/documentation/en/flashplayer/help/settings_manager04.html"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">http://www.macromedia.com/support/documentation/en/flashplayer/help/settings_manager04.html </span></a></span></p>
<h3 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><span style="font-size: medium; font-family: Arial;">Part III</span></h3>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 1:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">In this step I would like to explain how you can integrate Flex Builder and Java Builder into same project, otherwise you have to create two or more projects for debugging Java or Flex code in the Eclipse. Open .project file in your Flex Project. You may see we have only flexbuilder builder plug-in declaration.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;name&gt;com.adobe.flexbuilder.project.flexbuilder&lt;/name&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>&lt;/arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">I you will compare with .project file stored in Synergy (check .project in midtier directory or create a new Java Project) XML file contains javabuilder class name:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;name&gt; org.eclipse.jdt.core.javabuilder&lt;/name&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Let&rsquo;s merge together:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;name&gt;com.adobe.flexbuilder.project.flexbuilder&lt;/name&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;arguments&gt;&lt;/arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;name&gt; org.eclipse.jdt.core.javabuilder&lt;/name&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;arguments&gt;&lt;/arguments&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildCommand&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>&lt;/buildSpec&gt;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now we need to merge natures as well:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;natures&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;nature&gt;org.eclipse.jdt.core.javanature&lt;/nature&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;nature&gt;com.adobe.flexbuilder.project.flexnature&lt;/nature&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;nature&gt;com.adobe.flexbuilder.project.actionscriptnature&lt;/nature&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;/natures&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Save file, right click on your project, select Refresh. Right click one more time go to Properties menu and you should see two builders.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span></em> Flex builder nature working with .actionScriptProperties file, but Java Builder nature .classpath. So, we should not get any conflicts using two builders in the same project.</span></p>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 2:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Before to continue and configure java sources you have to build midtier using Apache Ant. Please use ant <strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;">all</span></span></strong> target.</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l13 level1 lfo15; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">In the Properties window select a Java Build Path item and click on the right side on Link Source&hellip; button. Browse to your midtier\plugins folder and select what ever project code you want to debug flashboards/java or Visualizer/java or you can link both, give some appropriate name to your source folders and click on Finish button.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now click on Libraries tab and click on Add Variable&hellip; button. </span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now please press on Configure Variables&hellip; button</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">And in the Preferences window click on New&hellip; button</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Please add a new library variable MIDTIER and browse to your midtier directory</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Please do the same steps for variables: TOMCAT_HOME, ARSystemAPI and ARSystemAPI70.<br />TOMCAT_HOME &ndash; should point to your local Tomcat 5.5<br />ARSystemAPI &ndash; to local or remote libraries </span><a href="file://essfs1/DEVKITS/ars/dev/current/winnt/lib"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">\\essfs1\DEVKITS\ars\dev\current\winnt\lib</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">, </span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-indent: 0.5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">ARSystemAPI70 - to local or remote libraries<br /><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span></span><a href="file://essfs1/DEVKITS/ars/7.0.1_esc/current/winnt/lib"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">\\essfs1\DEVKITS\ars\7.0.1_esc\current\winnt\lib</span></a></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Close all popup windows clicking OK buttons</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">As soon as project will be compiled you will get many errors in the Problems tab related to the Java code. Now time to modify .classpath file.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">You can do from Eclipse IDE Properties-&gt;Libraries window, Add Variables&hellip;, select variable then Extend&hellip;, and select path to the jar file. You need to add all jar files what I describe bellow.</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<h2 style="margin: 12pt 0in 3pt;"><em><span style="font-family: Arial;">Step 3:</span></em></h2>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>In this step I will explain how you can debug Java and Flex code in <strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Flashboard</span></strong>. </span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Run Tomcat from the Eclipse IDE. If you don&rsquo;t have Tomcat icons you need to install Tomcat plug-in from </span><a href="http://www.eclipsetotale.com/tomcatPlugin.html"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">eclipsetotale.com website</span></a><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">. </span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; text-indent: -0.25in; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list 0in;"><span style="font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol;"><span style="mso-list: Ignore;">&middot;<span style="font: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Before to continue we need to verify if your Tomcat configured &ldquo;arsys&rdquo; Virtual directory. Open Tomcat 5.5\conf\Catalina\localhost folder you must have a file arsys.xml.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><br /><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?&gt;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;Context displayName="Remedy AR System" docBase="C:/eclipse/workspace/midtier/built" path="/arsys" workDir="work\Catalina\localhost\arsys"&gt;&lt;/Context&gt;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span></span>Where C:/eclipse/workspace/midtier/built path into your local <strong>built</strong> directory under midtier.</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Check if your project output directory in &ldquo;Flex Build Path&rdquo; pointing to the same <strong>built</strong> directory and ending with flex-bin in the path. Example:<span style="mso-spacerun: yes;">&nbsp; </span>${DOCUMENTS}\midtier\built\flex-bin or<br />C:\eclipse\workspace\midtier\built\flex-bin</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Select from the Eclipse IDE Project -&gt; Clean&hellip;</span></li>
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Select Flash Repository, expand [source path] flex node, right click Flashboard.mxml and select from drop down menu Run As -&gt; Flex Application, or Debug As -&gt; Flex Application</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now select Java Repository. Expand flashboard_java package. Open FlashDataRenderer.java, set break point on line 543 (good place to start debugging Flashboard)</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Open the browser and enter URL to your Flashboard form. As soon as form loading you should get break point selection on the line 543. <br /><br /><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span></em> </span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">At this time Flashboard.swf file will be loaded from server resource class. When we are sending first time request to the midtier, compiled by ant Flashboard.jar in midtier\built\LocalPlugins\Flashboard will be copy into midtier\built\PluginsCache\LocalDisk\Flashboard\classes.jar. And any changes making in your flex Flashboard Application will not be effected in the browser.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">In the flex.js you can see I reserved &ldquo;flexdebug&rdquo; parameter for loading SWF file from midtier/built/flex-bin. Please append this flag into your address bar URL. (Every time when you will compile Flashboard.mxml file, the Flex Builder will create Flashboard.swf under midtier/built/flex-bin, now to get your latest changes you need to refresh the browser page)</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Example:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><a href="http://dgofman-sjc-58:8080/arsys/forms/charlie1/FlashboardTestForm/Default+Admin+View/?cacheid=cdcab909&amp;flexdebug=1"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">http://dgofman-sjc-58:8080/arsys/forms/charlie1/FlashboardTestForm/Default+Admin+View/?cacheid=cdcab909&amp;flexdebug=1</span></a></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Summary</span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">On the end I would like to explain how you can configure your project to be able to debug Visualizer or Flashboard flex and java code. Another advantage in this design you can switch work directory (for example to point another midtier folder) without modifying .project file. For that reason I created in Eclipse a new environment variable MIDTIER (see Step 1 in </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Part I session) and browse source code into the midtier directory. </span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 9pt; font-family: Arial;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">P.S.</span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">How to debug Flex and Java at same time???</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Before to start making changes in your files, please make sure your local midtier is compiled without any error. You also must to create a form with DVF and set to flex flashboard plug-in (</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">flashdisplay=1)</span><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">. Open browser and try to access to this form.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now we have to in .flexProperties add additional parameters to run application instead from local file directory on the server side. As you know Flashboard receiving data from midtier server using JavaScript Bridge, at same time midtier JavaScript interfaces connecting to the midtier using AJAX protocol. Unfortunately you cannot open request if your HTML page is not belongs to the same domain; otherwise you will security exception in JavaScript.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">So please modified .flexProperties file:</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;flexProperties flexServerType="16" serverRoot="MIDTIER/built" serverRootURL="http://dgofman-sjc-58:8080/arsys/" toolCompile="true" useServerFlexSDK="false" version="1"/&gt;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">You can use full path to your midtier if you are not configure a MIDTIER variable.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&lt;flexProperties flexServerType="16" serverRoot="C:/eclipse/workspace/flexProto/midtier/built" serverRootURL="http://dgofman-sjc-58:8080/arsys/" toolCompile="true" useServerFlexSDK="false" version="1"/&gt;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Please don&rsquo;t forget to modify <span style="font-size: 10pt;">serverRootURL.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="margin-top: 0in;" type="disc">
<li class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo14; tab-stops: list .5in;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Please replace code bellow into index.template.html:</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Flashboard</span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 8pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">IMPORTANT: Before to execute a project we have to lunch the arsys form and be sure the login session always active. From my experience if you will use Internet Explorer every time when you run Flashboard, Eclipse will open a new browser window and session will not be shared. Please use Mozilla FireFox in this case. In your Eclipse IDE choice Window-&gt;Preferences. Expand General tab and select Web Brower node. If you don&rsquo;t have FireFox by default, please add into this list box and select a check box to be able to run as a default browser.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span></em> If you working on browser what can share session between the new windows. Please modify your index.template.html to detect AJAX component communication:<br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /><br style="mso-special-character: line-break;" /></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: black; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">var fetcher = new XMLHttpRequest();</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;"></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now, go to Flex Repository, expand flashboard flex source. Open Flashboard.mxml file. Set break point on line 110. Right click on Flashboard.mxml and choose Run as Debug -&gt; Flashboard Application.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;"><em><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Note:</span></em> For testing Visualizer you can set breakpoint on line 147 and run for debugging.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Now you can switch to Java Repository or stay in Flex Repository but we need to find file midtier\java\com\remedy\arsys\plugincontainer\impl\PluginEventServlet.java.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Open this file and set breakpoint on the line 43.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Switch to Flex Builder debugger and press continue debug button. You should get breakpoint line selection in the Java code. You can navigate line by line or press continue button and you will switch to Flex Repository back.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Q &amp; A</span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-size: 16pt;"><span style="text-decoration: none;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">1) How to test localization messages on Flashboard?</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Copy locale JavaScript file from midtier\built\resources\standard\javascript</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Register this class in index.template.html</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: navy; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&lt;script</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: black; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;"> </span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: navy; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">type=</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: green; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">"text/javascript"</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: black; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;"> </span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: navy; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">src=</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: green; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">"LocalizedMessages_{LOCAL}.js"</span><span style="font-size: 8pt; color: navy; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Clean project and run</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-layout-grid-align: none;"><span style="font-size: 8pt; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; mso-bidi-language: HE;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">2) Why when I compiled using ant script, I cannot see changes in the midtier flex application?</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Open midtier\build.properties file and make sure FLEX_SDK_HOME variable is uncomment and pointing to Flex SDK on the server machine or your local machine.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">Give absolute path FLEX_SERVER variable to your midtier folder.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">FLEX_SERVER = C:\\eclipse\\workspace\\midtier</span></em></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">FLEX_SDK_HOME = \\\\Rieesxbld5-ars1\\flexHome\\flex_sdk_3</span></em></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></em></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">3) How to apply Flashboard changes without executing ant build and restarting a web server?</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">You need just compile Flex Application. Open browser and on the end of your form request add flexdebug=1.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">http://SERVER:PORT/arsys/forms/SERVER/FlashboardForm/ VIEW/?flexdebug=1</span></em></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></em></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">4) Where is Flashboard distribution file?</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">During compilation Apache Ant, by default in the build.xml configured for outputting compiled files into midtier\build\plugins\flashboards directory, on the end of a plugin task all these files will be compressed into midtier\built\LocalPlugins\Flashboard\Flashboard.jar file. When you will start a Tomcat and making first request to your Flashboard form, midtier will copy Flashboard.jar into midtier\built\PluginsCache\LocalDisk\Flashboard\classes.jar. If you decided to modify some JS, SWF or HTML in this file, please don&rsquo;t forget to stop a Tomcat server.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</span></p>
